remarks: A triplet of elements of a class is a subset of the class.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-1994.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 29-Jun-2011.)
statement:
tpss.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
tpss.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
tpss.3 $e |- C e. _V $.
tpss $p |- ( ( A e. D /\ B e. D /\ C e. D ) <-> { A , B , C } C_ D ) $.
